About

Aspiring Software Developer with a comprehensive educational background in programming and software development from Herzing College. Proficient in creating user-centric solutions using NEXT.js and Material UI, with a proven track record of enhancing system performance and operational efficiency. Seeking a dynamic role that encourages innovative thinking and continuous learning, where I can leverage my problem-solving skills and technical expertise.

.Net Horse Race

This is a Casino style horse racing game. Users Place a bet and select which horse they think will win.

    Puzzle Games

Word Scramble and Hangman Game

Video Store

Designed and developed a video store management software inspired by the classic Blockbuster rental store interface. The application allows employees to track inventory, create client memberships, and manage video rentals and returns efficiently.

    Video store

Java Memory Game

Developed a card-style memory game using Java, where users try to match pairs of tiles. For debugging purposes, matching tiles are displayed by default. The number of guesses allowed and the size of the game board adjust based on the selected difficulty level.

    Memory Game
